options.title: Roadmap
options.author: MISACA
options.description:
Senpai ... >.< This will be my features in the future.
Maybe it will help you <3

features.name: Birthday Reminder
features.description: A feature, in which you can see upcoming Birthdays of the members of disord - the participation of the members is optional. You add or delete your Birthday via DM. Optional: Bot can congratulate in public or via DM

features.name: Food Suggestion
features.description: A feature, where you ask which food you should eat/cook. You can add options like what type of meal (fish, meat, vegetables etc.) and which time (breakfast, dinner etc.). Optional: The bot offers you a dish from your nearest delivery service

features.name: Art Suggestion
features.description: A feature, where you ask for some inspiration for your next art (draw a cyperpunk pirate with dragon wings etc.). I have no fcking idea where I can get creative themes, but let's try...

features.name: Daily news
features.description: A feature, where you ask for some daily news - basically google news api, i guess

features.name: Daily vocables
features.description: A feature, where you ask for some daily vocables. No idea, where I can get them & and what the specs should be

features.name: Hentai Twitter Link
features.description: Gives you a random hentai link from twitter

features.name: Valorant Fun Stats
features.description: Drops some random fun stats from valorant, about the members of the discord (Eneya has bought Kid weapons worth 102340 Credits etc.)

features.name: League of Legends Fun Stats
features.description: Drops some random fun stats from league, about the members of the discord (Unicorn has dealt 10k damage on Qiyana in the last 10 games)
